response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price reflects its true value while allowing for a fair transaction between us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 12000}
